description: Students develop more advanced technique in writing for instruments and voice through individual study in creative composition, focusing on smaller ensembles. This course may be repeated. Prerequisite: Music 223. Generally offered Fall and Spring Semesters.
name: Composition II
prerequisites: Music 223. Generally offered Fall and Spring Semesters.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: Music 223. Generally offered Fall and Spring Semesters.
